citation_details.title: A studyforrest extension, MEG recordings while watching the audio-visual movie “Forrest Gump”
citation_details.author: X Liu, Y Dai, H Xie, Z Zhen
citation_details.abstract: Naturalistic stimuli, such as movies, are being increasingly used to map brain function  because of their high ecological validity. The pioneering studyforrest and other naturalistic
citation_details.short_author: X Liu, Y Dai, H Xie, Z Zhen
